transcript: most of the day-to-day of Entrepreneurship is just getting kicked in the nuts every single day for years on end with an occasional glimmer of hope followed by a swift kick in the nuts one you have to have pain tolerance but that makes it sound super Alpha and whatever because I don't really think it's pain tolerance I think it's reframing pain as reality and something to be expected and the price that we are willing to pay for the thing that we want
